item.description:
Our regular monthly meeting! Hope you'll join us...

The theme for the evening is Camera Bags- Share what you got! That's right here is your chance to show us your favorite bag... is it awesome? Why do you like it... Do you have a bag you are no longer using - maybe some one is looking for a new bag! You should bring it - maybe someone will want to buy it!

If you are not into the bag idea- by all means bring your images! Show off some new work, or old work, or what ever is making you smile this week!

See you there!

Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Worcester Photography Meetup
